The reason for this is that each git_pillar branch/tag is processed separately from the rest. Therefore, if the qa branch is to be used for git_pillar, it would need to have its own top file, with the qa environment defined within it, like this:
trans-unit.target: 用于git_pillar的每个分支/标签都必须有自己的顶级文件。这是从顶部文件配置时是如何工作的不同国家。这是因为每个git_pillar分支/标签都与其余分支/标签分开处理。因此，如果将 qa 分支用于git_pillar，则需要具有自己的顶级文件，并在其中定义 qa 环境，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Each client requires different arguments and sometimes has different syntax. For example, LocalClient requires the tgt argument because it forwards the command to Minions and the other client interfaces do not. LocalClient also takes arg (array) and kwarg (dictionary) arguments because these values are sent to the Minions and used to execute the requested function there. RunnerClient and WheelClient are executed directly on the Master and thus do not need or accept those arguments.
trans-unit.target: 每个客户端需要不同的参数，有时具有不同的语法。例如， LocalClient 需要 tgt 参数，因为它将命令转发给Minions，而其他客户端接口则不需要。 LocalClient 还采用了 arg （数组）和 kwarg （字典）参数，因为这些值被发送到Minions，并用于在那里执行所请求的功能。 RunnerClient 和 WheelClient 直接在主服务器上执行，因此不需要或不接受这些参数。

trans-unit.source: Each ext_pillar is called separately from the others. So, in the above example, the etcd ext_pillar will be evaluated first, with the first group of git_pillar remotes evaluated next (and merged into the etcd pillar data). Lastly, the second group of git_pillar remotes will be evaluated, and then merged into the ext_pillar data evaluated before it.
trans-unit.target: 每个ext_pillar与其他ext_pillar分开调用。因此，在上面的示例中，将首先评估 etcd ext_pillar，然后评估第一组git_pillar远程控制器（并合并到etcd支柱数据中）。最后，将评估第二组git_pillar远程控制器，然后将其合并到之前评估的ext_pillar数据中。

trans-unit.source: Each storage container will be mapped to an environment. By default, containers will be mapped to the base environment. You can override this behavior with the saltenv configuration option. You can have an unlimited number of storage containers, and can have a storage container serve multiple environments, or have multiple storage containers mapped to the same environment. Normal first-found rules apply, and storage containers are searched in the order they are defined.
trans-unit.target: 每个存储容器都将映射到一个环境。默认情况下，容器将映射到 base 环境。您可以使用 saltenv 配置选项覆盖此行为。您可以有无限数量的存储容器，可以有一个存储容器为多个环境服务，或者有多个存储容器映射到同一环境。常规的先发现规则适用，并且按照定义的顺序搜索存储容器。

trans-unit.target: 确保带有传递属性的主题规则不存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensure trail exists.
trans-unit.target: 确保存在线索。

trans-unit.source: Ensure trail with passed properties is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保有传递属性的线索是缺席的。

trans-unit.source: Ensure user account is absent
trans-unit.target: 确保用户账户不在

trans-unit.source: Ensure user does not exists
trans-unit.target: 确保用户不存在

trans-unit.source: Ensure vm is absent on the computenode
trans-unit.target: 确保计算节点上没有vm。

trans-unit.source: Ensure vm is in the running state on the computenode
trans-unit.target: 确保vm在computenode上处于运行状态。

trans-unit.source: Ensure vm is in the stopped state on the computenode
trans-unit.target: 确保vm在computenode上处于停止状态。

trans-unit.source: Ensure vm is present on the computenode
trans-unit.target: 确保vm存在于computenode上。

trans-unit.source: Ensure we are using the latest revision in the hg repository
trans-unit.target: 确保我们使用的是hg仓库中的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: Ensure you know what you are doing before using this function.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此功能之前,请确保你知道自己在做什么。

trans-unit.source: Ensure zone is attached
trans-unit.target: 确保区段已连接

trans-unit.source: Ensure zone is booted
trans-unit.target: 确保区段已启动

trans-unit.source: Ensure zone is detached
trans-unit.target: 确保该区是分离的

trans-unit.source: Ensure zone is halted
trans-unit.target: 确保该区停止运行

trans-unit.source: Ensure zone is installed
trans-unit.target: 确保区段安装完毕

trans-unit.source: Ensure zone is uninstalled
trans-unit.target: 确保区段已卸载

trans-unit.source: Ensures a container is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保一个容器没有。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a container is present.
trans-unit.target: 确保有一个容器存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a host's NTP server configuration such as setting NTP servers, ensuring the NTP daemon is running or stopped, or restarting the NTP daemon for the ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机的 NTP 服务器配置,如设置 NTP 服务器,确保 NTP 守护进程运行或停止,或重新启动 ESXi 主机的 NTP 守护进程。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a host's core dump configuration.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机的核心转储配置。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a load balancer is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保负载平衡器缺席。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a load balancer is present.
trans-unit.target: 确保有一个负载平衡器。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a object is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保一个对象不在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a object is downloaded locally.
trans-unit.target: 确保对象被下载到本地。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a object is presnt.
trans-unit.target: 确保一个对象被预置。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a record is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保没有记录。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a record is present.
trans-unit.target: 确保有记录。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a datasource with given properties exist on the jboss instance. If datasource doesn't exist, it is created, otherwise only the properties that are different will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 确保在jboss实例上存在一个具有给定属性的数据源,如果数据源不存在,就会被创建,否则只有不同的属性会被更新。如果数据源不存在,则会被创建,否则只有不同的属性会被更新。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a file is saved to the minion's cache. This state is primarily invoked by other states to ensure that we do not re-download a source file if we do not need to.
trans-unit.target: 确保文件被保存到奴仆的缓存中。这个状态主要是被其他状态调用,以确保我们在不需要的情况下不会重新下载源文件。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a security rule exists on the device. Also, ensure that all configurations are set appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 确保设备上存在安全规则。同时,确保所有的配置都有适当的设置。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a service group object exists in the configured state. If it does not exist or is not configured with the specified attributes, it will be adjusted to match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 确保服务组对象在配置的状态下存在。如果它不存在或没有配置指定的属性,它将被调整为与指定的值相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a service object exists in the configured state. If it does not exist or is not configured with the specified attributes, it will be adjusted to match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 确保服务对象在配置状态下存在。如果它不存在或没有配置指定的属性,它将被调整为符合指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a software version is downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 确保软件版本被下载。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a user is configured on the device. Due to being unable to verify the user password. This is a forced operation.
trans-unit.target: 确保设备上配置了一个用户。由于无法验证用户密码。这属于强制操作。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that an address group object exists in the configured state. If it does not exist or is not configured with the specified attributes, it will be adjusted to match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 确保地址组对象在配置状态下存在。如果它不存在或没有配置指定的属性,将被调整为与指定的值相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that an address object exists in the configured state. If it does not exist or is not configured with the specified attributes, it will be adjusted to match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 确保地址对象在配置状态下存在。如果它不存在或没有配置指定的属性,它将被调整为与指定的值相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that given JNDI binding are present on the server. If a binding doesn't exist on the server it will be created. If it already exists its value will be changed.
trans-unit.target: 确保给定的JNDI绑定存在于服务器上。如果一个绑定在服务器上不存在,它将被创建。如果它已经存在,它的值将被改变。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that server is in running or reload-required state (by reading server-state attribute)
trans-unit.target: 确保服务器处于运行或重载需求状态(通过读取服务器状态属性)。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that templates are assigned to the host.
trans-unit.target: 确保模板分配给主机。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the NTP servers are configured. Servers are provided as an individual string or list format. Only four NTP servers will be reviewed. Any entries past four will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 确保配置了NTP服务器。服务器以单个字符串或列表格式提供。只有四个NTP服务器会被审查。任何超过四个的条目将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the artifact from artifactory exists at given location. If it doesn't exist, then it will be downloaded. If it already exists then the checksum of existing file is checked against checksum in artifactory. If it is different then the step will fail.
trans-unit.target: 确保来自artifactory的工件存在于指定位置。如果它不存在,那么它将被下载。如果它已经存在,那么现有文件的校验和将与artifactory中的校验和进行比较。如果它是不同的,那么这个步骤将失败。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the following line is present in /etc/sudoers:
trans-unit.target: 确保/etc/sudoers中存在以下一行。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the given application is deployed on server.
trans-unit.target: 确保指定的应用程序部署在服务器上。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the host does not exists, eventually deletes host.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机不存在,最终删除主机。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the host exists, eventually creates new host. NOTE: please use argument visible_name instead of name to not mess with name from salt sls. This function accepts all standard host properties: keyword argument names differ depending on your zabbix version, see: https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/2.4/manual/api/reference/host/object#host
trans-unit.target: 确保主机存在，最终创建新主机。注意：请使用参数visible_name而不是name，以免与salt sls的名称混淆。此函数接受所有标准主机属性：关键字参数名称因您的zabbix版本而异，请参见：https : //www.zabbix.com/documentation/2.4/manual/api/reference/host/object#host

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the host group does not exist, eventually delete host group.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机组不存在,最终删除主机组。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the host group exists, eventually creates new host group.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机组存在,最终创建新的主机组。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the hostname is set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机名被设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the keystone project exists Alias for tenant_present from V2 API to fulfill V3 API naming convention.
trans-unit.target: 确保V2 API中tenant_present的别名存在,以满足V3 API的命名惯例。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the keystone tenant exists
trans-unit.target: 确保关键租户的存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the logging levels are set on the device. The logging levels must match the following options: emergency, alert, critical, error, warning, notice, informational, debug.
trans-unit.target: 确保在设备上设置日志级别。日志等级必须与以下选项相匹配:紧急、警报、关键、错误、警告、通知、信息、调试。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the mediatype does not exist, eventually deletes the mediatype.
trans-unit.target: 确保mediatype不存在,最终删除mediatype。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named DNS record is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的DNS记录不存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named DNS record is present with the given ttl.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的DNS记录以给定的ttl存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named alias is present with the given target or list of targets. If the alias exists but the target differs from the previous entry, the target(s) will be overwritten. If the alias does not exist, the alias will be created.
trans-unit.target: 确保指定的目标或目标列表中存在命名的别名。如果别名存在,但目标与之前的条目不同,则目标将被覆盖。如果别名不存在,将创建别名。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named bridge does not exist, eventually deletes it.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的网桥不存在,最终将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named bridge exists, eventually creates it.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名桥的存在,最终创建它。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named command is not running.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的命令没有运行。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named configmap is absent from the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的configmap不在指定的命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named configmap is present inside of the specified namespace with the given data. If the configmap exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保被命名的configmap存在于指定的命名空间中。如果configmap存在,它将被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named deployment is absent from the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的部署不在指定的命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named deployment is present inside of the specified namespace with the given metadata and spec. If the deployment exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的部署存在于指定的命名空间中,并具有给定的元数据和规格。如果部署存在,则会被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named host is present with the given ip
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的主机在给定的IP下存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named label is absent from the node.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名标签不在节点中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named label is set on the named node with the given value. If the label exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保在命名的节点上设置给定值的命名标签。如果标签存在,将被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named namespace is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保没有命名的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named namespace is present.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名空间存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named pod is absent from the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的 pod 不在给定的命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named pod is present inside of the specified namespace with the given metadata and spec. If the pod exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的 pod 存在于指定的命名空间内,并具有给定的元数据和规格。如果 pod 存在,它将被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named port exists on bridge, eventually creates it.
trans-unit.target: 确保指定的端口在网桥上存在,并最终创建它。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named port exists on bridge, eventually deletes it. If bridge is not set, port is removed from whatever bridge contains it.
trans-unit.target: 确保指定的 port 存在于 bridge 上,并最终将其删除。如果桥接没有设置,则端口会从包含它的桥接中被删除。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named secret is absent from the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 确保指定的命名空间中没有命名的秘密。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named secret is present inside of the specified namespace with the given data. If the secret exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的秘密存在于给定数据的指定命名空间内。如果秘密存在,将被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named service is absent from the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的服务不在指定的命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named service is masked (i.e. prevented from being started).
trans-unit.target: 确保被命名的服务被屏蔽(即防止被启动)。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named service is present inside of the specified namespace with the given metadata and spec. If the deployment exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的服务存在于指定的命名空间中,并具有给定的元数据和规格。如果部署存在,它将被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named service is unmasked
trans-unit.target: 确保已命名的服务不被掩盖。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the power configuration is configured on the system. This is only available on some C-Series servers.
trans-unit.target: 确保系统上配置了电源配置。该功能仅在部分C系列服务器上可用。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified PowerPath license key is absent on the host.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机上没有指定的PowerPath许可证密钥。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified PowerPath license key is present on the host.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机上存在指定的PowerPath许可证密钥。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the syslog servers are set to the specified values. A value of None will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 确保syslog服务器被设置为指定的值。值为 "无 "将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the user does not exist, eventually delete user.
trans-unit.target: 确保用户不存在,最终删除用户。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the user exists, eventually creates new user. NOTE: use argument firstname instead of name to not mess values with name from salt sls.
trans-unit.target: 确保用户存在,最终创建新用户。注意:使用参数firstname而不是name,以避免在salt sls中用name乱码。
